name: Amadeus Consulting
overview: Amadeus Consulting, a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, delivers custom application development solutions for the Web, PC, and mobile devices, that integrate with just about anything you have or can envision. The company is an expert in custom software applications such as content management systems, e-commerce, surveys, social networking sites, data collection and management, browser plug-ins, rich Internet applications, and mobile application development including iPhone and Windows Mobile. Whether a company is ready to grow a business through technology, optimize core processes or work flow, strategically plan for the future, or even help save an existing project whose success is in jeopardy, we can help.

milestones.description: Amadeus Consulting Group, Inc. founded and incorporated
Amadeus Consulting Group, Inc. founded and incorporated
